about_the_game: Truth or Dare is a first-person horror game where you play as Claire, a teenager who, along with her boyfriend Jamie, is dared to take a selfie inside a haunted house. Once the site of a brutal family murder, the house is rumored to be cursed, and the spirits of the victims are restless.
detailed_description: Truth or Dare is a first-person horror game where you play as Claire, a teenager who, along with her boyfriend Jamie, is dared to take a selfie inside a haunted house. name: Truth or Dare Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 20 series or better, or AMD RX 6000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: What starts as a simple dare quickly turns into a fight for survival as Claire and Jamie explore the dark, abandoned rooms, solve eerie puzzles, and uncover the terrifying truth behind the family’s death. Can they escape, or will they become the house’s next victims?
